description: Workflow enforcement hooks for devflow plugin

hooks.prompt: Check if a /feature or /tdd workflow is active. FOR /feature WORKFLOW: If YES: 1) Identify the current phase (1-9) based on conversation progress. 2) List completed phases. 3) Note key decisions (selected architecture, test strategy approval). 4) Identify the current task being worked on (e.g., TASK-001). 5) Write state to claude-tmp/devflow-feature-state.json using Write tool with format: {"active": true, "currentPhase": N, "completedPhases": [...], "currentTask": "TASK-NNN" or null, "decisions": {...}, "summary": "brief context"}. 6) If claude-tmp/devflow-plan.md exists, update it: a) Update the Status block's Current Task field, b) Add a progress log entry with timestamp and current state, c) Mark any completed tasks with [x] if not already marked. FOR /tdd WORKFLOW: If YES: 1) Identify the current phase (1-9) and current TDD task with substep (TDD-NNN, red/green/refactor). 2) List completed phases and TDD tasks. 3) Note key decisions (test plan approval, architecture selection). 4) Note attempt count if in GREEN phase. 5) Write state to claude-tmp/devflow-tdd-state.json using Write tool with format: {"active": true, "currentPhase": N, "completedPhases": [...], "currentTask": {"id": "TDD-NNN", "substep": "red|green|refactor", "attempts": N, "errors": [...]}, "completedTasks": [...], "blockedTasks": [...], "decisions": {...}, "summary": "brief context"}. 6) If claude-tmp/tdd-plan.md exists, update it: a) Update the Status block's Current Task and Current Substep fields, b) Add a progress log entry with timestamp, task, substep, and current state, c) Mark any completed substeps with [x] if not already marked. Return: {"decision": "allow"}. If NO active workflow, return: {"decision": "allow"}.
